amendment.description: To ensure cost-effective procedures to fill the Strategic Petroleum Reserve.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1750 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1750 proposed by Senator Leahy for Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S11808-11811; text: CR S11808) To ensure cost-effective procedures to fill the Strategic Petroleum Reserve.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1750 proposed by Senator Leahy for Senator Levin.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1750 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
